description: Freeze architecture contracts and enforce quality gates in CI.
Remove all P0 curriculum defects across CEFR progression and session integrity.
Resolve prompt_ref and resource locator integrity across all weeks.
Unify shell and router around one canonical route contract.
Adopt one CSS entrypoint and govern style architecture.
Replace hardcoded dashboard and progress UI values with runtime state.
Harden rehydration, fallback, retries, and resilience in session runtime.
Implement event schema and critical-path e2e validation.
Deliver AA accessibility, performance budgets, and release checklists.
Define one canonical route table, alias policy, and deprecation timeline.
acceptance_criteria: Single canonical route table documented; legacy aliases and deprecation date approved.

description: Make LearningShell and hash router consume the same canonical route definitions.
acceptance_criteria: Canonical routes implemented: hoy,sesion,cierre,evaluacion,modulos,progreso; legacy redirects preserved.
validation_commands: node --test app/web/js/tests/routes.test.mjs; node --test app/web/js/tests/hash_router.test.mjs; node --test app/web/js/tests/view_switcher.test.mjs

description: Create schema v4.1 and compatibility notes for v4 to v4.1 migration.
acceptance_criteria: schema.v4.1 and contract guide published; enum and integrity rules frozen.

description: Implement script that checks CEFR drift, prompt resolution, resource locator completeness, and empty sessions.
acceptance_criteria: Validator returns non-zero exit on P0 and outputs machine-readable report.

summary: Enable CI blocker for P0 findings
description: Wire audit command with fail-on-p0 into CI and block merge when P0 > 0.
acceptance_criteria: CI job fails when audit detects P0 issues and status is required for merge.

description: Decide official CSS entrypoint and deprecation strategy for secondary entrypoint.
acceptance_criteria: CSS entrypoint decision approved with migration plan.

description: Apply selected entrypoint in app/web/index.html and align stylesheet chain.
acceptance_criteria: App loads through one entrypoint; no critical regression on desktop/mobile.

summary: Create P0 remediation queue for S1-S2
description: Map all P0 findings to concrete S1/S2 tasks with file-level ownership.
acceptance_criteria: All current P0 findings mapped to actionable tasks with acceptance criteria.

description: Define and emit required runtime events with stable payload schema.
acceptance_criteria: Events include session_id, day_id, step_id, timestamp and pass unit tests.

description: Create canonical route/state table for all shell views.
List old hashes and deterministic redirect targets.
Unify route constants and labels in routing module.
Align view metadata with canonical route IDs.
Adjust route/hash/view switcher tests to canonical flow.
Add schema.v4.1 with frozen enums and integrity constraints.
Document data contract and compatibility strategy.
Validate existing week content against v4.1 expectations.
Detect week target vs step difficulty mismatches.
Detect unresolved prompt_ref and missing locator page.
Output machine-readable finding report with severity and path.
Create quality gate job in CI pipeline.
Run audit with fail-on-p0 and block merge.
Ensure quality job is required status check.
Compare styles.css vs css/index.css load chain.
Record final entrypoint decision and deprecation plan.
Point app shell to official CSS entrypoint.
Remove duplicate style loading and align CSS layer order.
Check desktop and mobile baseline views for regressions.
Extract all P0 findings with file-level evidence.
Group findings into implementation waves and assign owners.
Ensure every finding maps to one backlog task.
Define required runtime events and payload fields.
Instrument orchestrator/bootstrap with schema-compliant events.
Create unit tests validating event schema.
